Introduction
This topic includes information clarifying the principles for determining effective dates under historical 38 CFR 3.155, including the applicability of
informal claims
, and
38 CFR 3.114 to informal claims
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Historical Guidance on the Assignment of Effective Dates
citation: Part V, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B
